headline.main: O.E.C.D. Lowers Its Forecast for Global Growth This Year

keywords.value: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Sluggish global growth threatens to keep governments around the world from being able to pay pensions and bondholders, a top economist said.
lead_paragraph: Sluggish global growth threatens to keep governments around the world from being able to pay pensions and bondholders, a top economist said.
